# CytoHMM

A hidden Markov model for cytogenetic microarrays.

## Getting started

Python 3


## Installing

Using the source code from github.  First install numpy and cython
```
git clone https://github.com/harry-zuzan/cytohmm.git
cd cytohmm
python setup.py install

```

Using pip
```
pip install numpy
pip install cython
pip install cytohmm

```
